info.title: Bluesky Control Panel
info.description: Companion connector to Bluesky (Independent Publisher) for admin, tools, and chat functions.

post.description: Permanently deletes an account and all associated data. This endpoint is part of the chat.bsky namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: actorId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the actor whose account is being deleted.

success.description: Indicates if the account was successfully deleted.

message.description: Detailed error message.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

message.description: Detailed error message for unauthorized access.

post.description: Exports account data for the authenticated user, allowing them to back up or transfer information. This endpoint is part of the `chat.bsky` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: actorId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the actor exporting their data.

dataUrl.description: URL to download the exported account data.

message.description: Detailed error message.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

message.description: Detailed error message for unauthorized access.

post.description: Deletes a specific message from the userâ€™s view without affecting other participants' views. This endpoint is part of the `chat.bsky` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: messageId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the message to delete.

parameters.name: actorId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the actor deleting the message.

200.description: Successfully deleted the message for the actor.

success.description: Indicates if the message was successfully deleted from the actor's view.

message.description: Detailed error message.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

message.description: Detailed error message for unauthorized access.

get.description: Retrieves a conversation for specified members, based on unique identifiers for the members. This endpoint is part of the `chat.bsky` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: memberIds
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of member IDs for the conversation.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the conversation for specified members.

members.description: List of member IDs in the conversation.

message.description: Detailed error message.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

message.description: Detailed error message for unauthorized access.

get.description: Retrieves a conversation by its unique identifier. This endpoint is part of the `chat.bsky` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: convoId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the conversation.

members.description: List of member IDs in the conversation.

message.description: Detailed error message.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

message.description: Detailed error message for unauthorized access.

get.description: Retrieves the log (message history) of a specific conversation by its unique identifier.  This endpoint is part of the `chat.bsky` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: convoId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the conversation to retrieve the log.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of messages to retrieve in the log.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for paginated results, provided by the previous response.

cursor.description: Cursor for the next set of results, if available.

message.description: Detailed error message.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

message.description: Detailed error message for unauthorized access.

get.description: Retrieves a list of messages in a specific conversation by its unique identifier. This  endpoint is part of the `chat.bsky` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: convoId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the conversation to retrieve messages from.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of messages to retrieve.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for paginated results, provided by the previous response.

200.description: Successfully retrieved messages in the conversation.

cursor.description: Cursor for the next set of results, if available.

message.description: Detailed error message.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

message.description: Detailed error message for unauthorized access.

post.description: Allows the authenticated user to leave a specific conversation, removing it from their active  conversations. This endpoint is part of the `chat.bsky` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: convoId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the conversation to leave.

success.description: Indicates if the user successfully left the conversation.

message.description: Detailed error message.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

message.description: Detailed error message for unauthorized access.

get.description: Retrieves a list of active conversations for the authenticated user. This endpoint is part  of the `chat.bsky` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of conversations to retrieve.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for paginated results, provided by the previous response.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of conversations.

cursor.description: Cursor for the next set of results, if available.

message.description: Detailed error message.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

message.description: Detailed error message for unauthorized access.

post.description: Mutes a specific conversation for the authenticated user, disabling notifications for that  conversation. This endpoint is part of the `chat.bsky` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: convoId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the conversation to mute.

success.description: Indicates if the conversation was successfully muted.

message.description: Detailed error message.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

message.description: Detailed error message for unauthorized access.

post.description: Sends multiple messages to a specified conversation in a batch. This endpoint is part of the  `chat.bsky` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: convoId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the conversation to which messages are being sent.

timestamp.description: Timestamp of when the message was created.

success.description: Indicates if the batch of messages was successfully sent.

message.description: Detailed error message.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

message.description: Detailed error message for unauthorized access.

post.description: Sends a single message to a specified conversation. This endpoint is part of the `chat.bsky`  namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: convoId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the conversation to which the message is being sent.

timestamp.description: Timestamp of when the message was created.

success.description: Indicates if the message was successfully sent.

message.description: Detailed error message.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

message.description: Detailed error message for unauthorized access.

post.description: Unmutes a specific conversation for the authenticated user, re-enabling notifications for  that conversation. This endpoint is part of the `chat.bsky` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: convoId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the conversation to unmute.

success.description: Indicates if the conversation was successfully unmuted.

message.description: Detailed error message.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

message.description: Detailed error message for unauthorized access.

post.description: Marks the conversation as read up to a specified message, updating the read status for the  authenticated user. This endpoint is part of the `chat.bsky` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: convoId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the conversation.

parameters.name: lastReadMessageId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the last read message in the conversation.

200.description: Successfully updated the read status for the conversation.

success.description: Indicates if the read status was successfully updated.

message.description: Detailed error message.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

message.description: Detailed error message for unauthorized access.

get.description: Retrieves metadata for a specific actor, including any moderation details. This endpoint  is part of the `chat.bsky` namespace and typically requires authentication.

parameters.name: actorId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the actor whose metadata is being retrieved.

metadata.description: Metadata details for the actor, including moderation information.

message.description: Detailed error message.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

message.description: Detailed error message for unauthorized access.

get.description: Retrieves the context of a specific message, including any moderation details. This endpoint  is part of the `chat.bsky` namespace and typically requires authentication.

parameters.name: messageId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the message for which context is being retrieved.

context.description: Context details of the message, including moderation information.

message.description: Detailed error message.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

message.description: Detailed error message for unauthorized access.

post.description: Updates the access level for a specific actor, allowing moderation actions to be applied.  This endpoint is part of the `chat.bsky` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: actorId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the actor whose access level is being updated.

level.description: New access level for the actor (e.g., restricted, allowed).

success.description: Indicates if the actor's access level was successfully updated.

message.description: Detailed error message.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

message.description: Detailed error message for unauthorized access.

post.description: Permanently deletes an account along with all associated data. This endpoint is part of the  `atproto.admin` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the account to be deleted.

success.description: Indicates if the account was successfully deleted.

message.description: Detailed error message.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

message.description: Detailed error message for unauthorized access.

post.description: Disables all invite codes generated by an account, preventing them from being used. This endpoint  is part of the `atproto.admin` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the account whose invites are being disabled.

200.description: Successfully disabled invites for the specified account.

success.description: Indicates if the account's invites were successfully disabled.

message.description: Detailed error message.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

message.description: Detailed error message for unauthorized access.

post.description: Disables specified invite codes, rendering them unusable. This endpoint is part of the  `atproto.admin` namespace and requires authentication.

schema.description: List of invite codes to disable.

200.description: Successfully disabled the specified invite codes.

success.description: Indicates if the invite codes were successfully disabled.

message.description: Detailed error message.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

message.description: Detailed error message for unauthorized access.

post.description: Enables invite codes for a specified account, allowing new invite codes to be generated. This  endpoint is part of the `atproto.admin` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the account for which invites are being enabled.

200.description: Successfully enabled invites for the specified account.

success.description: Indicates if invites were successfully enabled for the account.

message.description: Detailed error message.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

message.description: Detailed error message for unauthorized access.

get.description: Retrieves information for a specific account based on its unique identifier. This endpoint  is part of the `atproto.admin` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the account whose information is being retrieved.

status.description: Status of the account (e.g., active, suspended).

message.description: Detailed error message.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

message.description: Detailed error message for unauthorized access.

get.description: Retrieves information for multiple accounts. This endpoint is part of the `atproto.admin`  namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: accountIds
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of account IDs to retrieve information for.

200.description: Successfully retrieved information for multiple accounts.

status.description: Status of the account (e.g., active, suspended).

message.description: Detailed error message.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

message.description: Detailed error message for unauthorized access.

get.description: Retrieves a list of invite codes, including their status and usage details. This endpoint  is part of the `atproto.admin` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the account for which invite codes are retrieved.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter by invite code status (e.g., active, expired).

200.description: Successfully retrieved list of invite codes.

uses.description: Number of times the invite code has been used.

maxUses.description: Maximum allowed uses for the invite code.

message.description: Detailed error message.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

message.description: Detailed error message for unauthorized access.

get.description: Retrieves the moderation status for a specific subject (e.g., an account or content). This  endpoint is part of the `atproto.admin` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: subjectId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the subject whose status is being retrieved.

status.description: Moderation status of the subject (e.g., active, suspended).

lastUpdated.description: Timestamp when the subject status was last updated.

message.description: Detailed error message.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

message.description: Detailed error message for unauthorized access.

get.description: Searches for accounts based on specified criteria, such as email or username. This endpoint  is part of the `atproto.admin` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Search term for finding accounts (e.g., email, username).

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter results by account status (e.g., active, suspended).

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to retrieve.

200.description: Successfully retrieved search results for accounts.

status.description: Status of the account (e.g., active, suspended).

message.description: Detailed error message.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

message.description: Detailed error message for unauthorized access.

post.description: Sends an email to a specified account, allowing administrators to communicate directly with users. This endpoint is part of the `atproto.admin` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the account to send the email to.

success.description: Indicates if the email was successfully sent.

message.description: Detailed error message.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

message.description: Detailed error message for unauthorized access.

post.description: Updates the email associated with a specified account. This endpoint is part of the  `atproto.admin` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the account to update.

parameters.name: newEmail
parameters.description: New email address to associate with the account.

success.description: Indicates if the email was successfully updated.

message.description: Detailed error message.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

message.description: Detailed error message for unauthorized access.

post.description: Updates the handle associated with a specified account. This endpoint is part of the  `atproto.admin` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the account to update.

parameters.name: newHandle
parameters.description: New handle to associate with the account.

success.description: Indicates if the handle was successfully updated.

message.description: Detailed error message.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

message.description: Detailed error message for unauthorized access.

post.description: Updates the password for a specified account. This endpoint is part of the `atproto.admin`  namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the account for which the password is being updated.

parameters.name: newPassword
parameters.description: The new password for the account.

success.description: Indicates if the password was successfully updated.

message.description: Detailed error message.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

message.description: Detailed error message for unauthorized access.

post.description: Updates the moderation status for a specified subject (e.g., an account or content). This endpoint  is part of the `atproto.admin` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: subjectId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the subject whose status is being updated.

parameters.name: newStatus
parameters.description: The new moderation status for the subject (e.g., active, suspended).

success.description: Indicates if the subject's status was successfully updated.

message.description: Detailed error message.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

message.description: Detailed error message for unauthorized access.

get.description: Retrieves a list of recommended DID (Decentralized Identifier) credentials for the authenticated user. This endpoint is part of the `atproto.identity` namespace and requires authentication.

issuedAt.description: Timestamp when the credential was issued.

message.description: Detailed error message.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

message.description: Detailed error message for unauthorized access.

post.description: Requests a signature for a PLC (Portable Lightweight Credentials) operation, enabling actions  requiring signed verification. This endpoint is part of the `atproto.identity` namespace and requires authentication.

operation.description: The payload of the PLC operation to be signed.

signature.description: The generated signature for the PLC operation.

message.description: Detailed error message.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

message.description: Detailed error message for unauthorized access.

get.description: Resolves a user handle to its associated decentralized identifier (DID), facilitating actions  that require the DID. This endpoint is part of the `atproto.identity` namespace.

parameters.name: handle
parameters.description: The user handle to be resolved to a DID.

did.description: The resolved decentralized identifier for the handle.

message.description: Detailed error message.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

message.description: Detailed error message for unauthorized access.

post.description: Signs a PLC (Portable Lightweight Credentials) operation, returning a signed version of the operation payload. This endpoint is part of the `atproto.identity` namespace and requires authentication.

operation.description: The PLC operation payload to be signed.

signedOperation.description: The signed version of the PLC operation payload.

message.description: Detailed error message.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

message.description: Detailed error message for unauthorized access.

post.description: Updates the handle associated with the authenticated user. This endpoint is part of the  `atproto.identity` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: newHandle
parameters.description: The new handle to be associated with the user.

success.description: Indicates if the handle was successfully updated.

message.description: Detailed error message.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

message.description: Detailed error message for unauthorized access.

get.description: Retrieves labels associated with content, allowing administrators to view and manage content labels. This endpoint is part of the `atproto.label` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: contentIds
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of content IDs to retrieve labels for.

parameters.name: labelType
parameters.description: Filter labels by type (e.g., offensive, spam).

200.description: Successfully retrieved labels for the specified content.

labels.description: List of labels associated with the content.

message.description: Detailed error message.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

message.description: Detailed error message for unauthorized access.

post.description: Submits a report regarding content or user behavior, initiating a moderation review. This endpoint  is part of the `atproto.moderation` namespace and requires authentication.

contentId.description: Unique identifier of the content being reported.

reporterId.description: Identifier of the user submitting the report.

reportId.description: Unique identifier of the created report.

status.description: Initial status of the report (e.g., pending).

message.description: Detailed error message.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

message.description: Detailed error message for unauthorized access.

post.description: Applies a batch of write operations to the repository, including creating, updating, and deleting records.  This endpoint is part of the `atproto.repo` namespace and requires authentication.

type.description: Type of write operation (e.g., create, update, delete).

record.description: The record object to be written.

success.description: Indicates if the writes were successfully applied.

message.description: Detailed error message.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

message.description: Detailed error message for unauthorized access.

post.description: Creates a new record within the repository. This endpoint is part of the `atproto.repo` namespace and requires authentication.

recordType.description: Type of the record to be created.

recordId.description: Unique identifier of the created record.

message.description: Detailed error message.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

message.description: Detailed error message for unauthorized access.

delete.description: Deletes a record from the repository based on its unique identifier. This endpoint is part of the `atproto.repo` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: recordId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the record to be deleted.

success.description: Indicates if the record was successfully deleted.

message.description: Detailed error message.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

message.description: Detailed error message for unauthorized access.

get.description: Retrieves metadata about the repository, providing an overview of its structure and configuration. This endpoint is part of the `atproto.repo` namespace.

parameters.name: repoId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the repository to describe.

message.description: Detailed error message.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

message.description: Detailed error message for unauthorized access.

get.description: Retrieves a specific record from the repository based on its unique identifier.  This endpoint is part of the `atproto.repo` namespace.

parameters.name: recordId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the record to retrieve.

data.description: Content and details of the retrieved record.

message.description: Detailed error message.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

message.description: Detailed error message for unauthorized access.

post.description: Imports an external repository into the current repository structure, enabling integration of  existing data. This endpoint is part of the `atproto.repo` namespace and requires authentication.

sourceUrl.description: URL of the external repository to import.

importOptions.description: Options for how the import should be handled.

success.description: Indicates if the import was successful.

importedRecords.description: List of identifiers for the imported records.

message.description: Detailed error message.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

message.description: Detailed error message for unauthorized access.

get.description: Retrieves a list of missing blobs (data units) in the repository. This endpoint  is part of the `atproto.repo` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: repoId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the repository to check for missing blobs.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of missing blobs.

items.description: The unique identifier of a missing blob.

message.description: Detailed error message.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

message.description: Detailed error message for unauthorized access.

get.description: Retrieves a list of records within the repository. This endpoint is part of the  `atproto.repo` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: repoId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the repository to list records from.

parameters.name: recordType
parameters.description: Filter by the type of records to list.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of records.

message.description: Detailed error message.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

message.description: Detailed error message for unauthorized access.

put.description: Updates or creates a record within the repository. This endpoint is part of the  `atproto.repo` namespace and requires authentication.

recordId.description: Unique identifier of the record to be created or updated.

200.description: Successfully put the record in the repository.

success.description: Indicates if the record was successfully created or updated.

message.description: Detailed error message.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

message.description: Detailed error message for unauthorized access.

post.description: Uploads a binary blob (data unit) to the repository. This endpoint is part of the `atproto.repo` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: blobData
parameters.description: The binary data to be uploaded as a blob.

blobId.description: Unique identifier of the uploaded blob.

success.description: Indicates if the blob was successfully uploaded.

error.description: Type of error encountered during the request.

message.description: Detailed error message.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

message.description: Detailed error message for unauthorized access.

post.description: Activates a newly created account based on verification data, enabling access to the platform. This endpoint is part of the `atproto.server` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: activationCode
parameters.description: The activation code provided to the user during account creation.

success.description: Indicates if the account was successfully activated.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid activation code or parameters.

message.description: Detailed error message.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

message.description: Detailed error message for unauthorized access.

get.description: Retrieves the status of a specific account, providing details on activation and accessibility. This endpoint is part of the `atproto.server` namespace.

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the account to check.

status.description: Status of the account (e.g., active, pending).

isActive.description: Indicates if the account is currently active.

message.description: Detailed error message.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

message.description: Detailed error message for unauthorized access.

post.description: Confirms a user's email address during account setup. This endpoint is part of the  `atproto.server` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: confirmationCode
parameters.description: The confirmation code sent to the user's email.

success.description: Indicates if the email was successfully confirmed.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid confirmation code or parameters.

message.description: Detailed error message.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

message.description: Detailed error message for unauthorized access.

post.description: Creates a new user account on the platform. This endpoint is part of the `atproto.server` namespace.

email.description: Email address associated with the account.

accountId.description: Unique identifier of the newly created account.

success.description: Indicates if the account was successfully created.

message.description: Detailed error message.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

message.description: Detailed error message for unauthorized access.

post.description: Generates a new app-specific password for the user, allowing limited access to applications. This endpoint is part of the `atproto.server` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: appName
parameters.description: The name of the application for which the password is being created.

success.description: Indicates if the app password was successfully created.

message.description: Detailed error message.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

message.description: Detailed error message for unauthorized access.

post.description: Creates a single invite code, allowing the invited user to create an account. This endpoint  is part of the `atproto.server` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: targetEmail
parameters.description: The email address of the user to be invited.

success.description: Indicates if the invite code was successfully created.

message.description: Detailed error message.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

message.description: Detailed error message for unauthorized access.

post.description: Creates multiple invite codes for account creation. This endpoint is part of the `atproto.server` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: quantity
parameters.description: The number of invite codes to generate.

parameters.name: emailDomains
parameters.description: Optional list of allowed email domains for the invite codes.

success.description: Indicates if the invite codes were successfully created.

message.description: Detailed error message.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

message.description: Detailed error message for unauthorized access.

post.description: Initiates a new user session, providing an authentication token. This endpoint is part of  the `atproto.server` namespace and requires authentication.

authToken.description: The generated authentication token for the session.

success.description: Indicates if the session was successfully created.

message.description: Detailed error message.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

message.description: Detailed error message for unauthorized access.

post.description: Deactivates the user's account, suspending access to the platform. This endpoint is part of the  `atproto.server` namespace and requires authentication.

success.description: Indicates if the account was successfully deactivated.

message.description: Detailed error message.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

message.description: Detailed error message for unauthorized access.

delete.description: Permanently deletes the user's account and all associated data from the platform.  This endpoint is part of the `atproto.server` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: confirmationCode
parameters.description: A code to confirm the account deletion action.

success.description: Indicates if the account was successfully deleted.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid confirmation code or parameters.

message.description: Detailed error message.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

message.description: Detailed error message for unauthorized access.

delete.description: Ends the user's current session, effectively logging them out. This endpoint is part of the  `atproto.server` namespace and requires authentication.

success.description: Indicates if the session was successfully deleted.

message.description: Detailed error message.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

message.description: Detailed error message for unauthorized access.

get.description: Retrieves metadata and configuration details about the server. This endpoint is part of the  `atproto.server` namespace.

features.description: List of features supported by the server.

message.description: Detailed error message.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

message.description: Detailed error message for unauthorized access.

get.description: Retrieves a list of invite codes associated with the user's account. This endpoint is part of the  `atproto.server` namespace and requires authentication.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the invite code was created.

expiresAt.description: Timestamp when the invite code will expire, if applicable.

message.description: Detailed error message.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

message.description: Detailed error message for unauthorized access.

get.description: Retrieves authentication information for the current service, such as token details or login requirements.  This endpoint is part of the `atproto.server` namespace and requires authentication.

expiresIn.description: Expiration time of the authentication token in seconds.

message.description: Detailed error message.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

message.description: Detailed error message for unauthorized access.

get.description: Retrieves details about the current session, including user information and session status.  This endpoint is part of the `atproto.server` namespace and requires authentication.

userId.description: Unique identifier of the user associated with the session.

isActive.description: Indicates if the session is currently active.

message.description: Detailed error message.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

message.description: Detailed error message for unauthorized access.

get.description: Retrieves a list of app-specific passwords generated for the user's account.  This endpoint is part of the `atproto.server` namespace and requires authentication.

200.description: Successfully retrieved list of app passwords.

appPasswordId.description: Unique identifier of the app password.
